name: Britz Construction Company v. Wingate Construction Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Britz Construction Co. v. Wingate Construction Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
parties: Britz Construction Company v. Wingate Construction Company, Appellant.
attorneys: Samuel P. Lavine, with him Steinberg, Richman, Price & Steinbroolc, for appellant.
Wilbur Greenberg, with him Eillel S. Levison, and Miller, Pincus and Greenberg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Britz Construction Company v. Wingate Construction Company, Appellant.
Argued November 17, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
January 4, 1967:
Samuel P. Lavine, with him Steinberg, Richman, Price & Steinbroolc, for appellant.
Wilbur Greenberg, with him Eillel S. Levison, and Miller, Pincus and Greenberg, for appellee.
